scripts.build: pnpm -r run clean && pnpm run build:tokens && pnpm run check:tailwind-preset && turbo run build
scripts.build:trace: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--trace-uncaught --enable-source-maps" pnpm --filter cms exec next build --debug
scripts.test:coverage: sh -c 'CI=true pnpm -r --no-bail --workspace-concurrency=1 --filter=!@acme/next-config run test -- --coverage; status=$?; pnpm --filter @acme/next-config run test:coverage || true; pnpm run coverage:merge; exit $status'
scripts.coverage:merge: mkdir -p coverage/merged && nyc merge coverage .nyc_output coverage/merged/coverage.json && nyc report -t coverage/merged -r html -r text-summary -r text
scripts.build:platform-machine: pnpm --filter @acme/i18n clean && pnpm --filter @acme/i18n build && pnpm --filter @acme/platform-core build && pnpm --filter @acme/platform-machine build
scripts.build:cms-deps: pnpm --filter @acme/config build && pnpm --filter @acme/date-utils build && pnpm --filter @acme/i18n build && pnpm --filter @acme/platform-core build && pnpm --filter @acme/platform-machine build && pnpm --filter @acme/email build && pnpm --filter @acme/auth build && pnpm --filter @acme/configurator build && pnpm --filter @acme/ui build && pnpm --filter @acme/theme build && pnpm --filter @acme/telemetry build
scripts.e2e: TEST_DATA_ROOT=__tests__/data node --import tsx scripts/src/seed-test-data.ts && NEXTAUTH_SECRET=test-nextauth-secret-32-chars-long-string! start-server-and-test "sh -c 'pnpm --filter @apps/cms build && pnpm --filter @apps/cms start'" http://localhost:3006 "pnpm exec cypress run --config-file apps/cms/cypress.config.mjs"
scripts.e2e:open: TEST_DATA_ROOT=__tests__/data node --import tsx scripts/src/seed-test-data.ts && NEXTAUTH_SECRET=test-nextauth-secret-32-chars-long-string! start-server-and-test "sh -c 'pnpm --filter @apps/cms build && pnpm --filter @apps/cms start'" http://localhost:3006 "pnpm exec cypress open --config-file apps/cms/cypress.config.mjs"
scripts.e2e:dashboard: TEST_DATA_ROOT=__tests__/data CYPRESS_E2E_SUITE=dashboard node --import tsx scripts/src/seed-test-data.ts && NEXTAUTH_SECRET=test-nextauth-secret-32-chars-long-string! start-server-and-test "sh -c 'pnpm --filter @apps/cms build && pnpm --filter @apps/cms start'" http://localhost:3006 "pnpm exec cypress run --config-file apps/cms/cypress.config.mjs --spec apps/cms/cypress/e2e/cms-a11y-dashboard.cy.ts"
scripts.e2e:smoke: TEST_DATA_ROOT=__tests__/data CYPRESS_E2E_SUITE=smoke node --import tsx scripts/src/seed-test-data.ts && NEXTAUTH_SECRET=test-nextauth-secret-32-chars-long-string! start-server-and-test "sh -c 'pnpm --filter @apps/cms build && pnpm --filter @apps/cms start'" http://localhost:3006 "pnpm exec cypress run --config-file apps/cms/cypress.config.mjs --env grepTags=smoke"
scripts.e2e:a11y: TEST_DATA_ROOT=__tests__/data node --import tsx scripts/src/seed-test-data.ts && NEXTAUTH_SECRET=test-nextauth-secret-32-chars-long-string! start-server-and-test "sh -c 'pnpm --filter @apps/cms build && pnpm --filter @apps/cms start'" http://localhost:3006 "pnpm exec cypress run --config-file apps/cms/cypress.config.mjs --env grepTags=a11y"
scripts.e2e:cms: TEST_DATA_ROOT=__tests__/data NEXTAUTH_URL=http://localhost:3010 CYPRESS_BASE_URL=http://localhost:3010 start-server-and-test "pnpm --filter @apps/cms exec next dev -p 3010" http://localhost:3010 "env -u ELECTRON_RUN_AS_NODE pnpm exec cypress run --config-file apps/cms/cypress.config.mjs --spec 'apps/cms/cypress/e2e/cms-a11y-*.cy.ts'"
scripts.e2e:cms:core: TEST_DATA_ROOT=__tests__/data NEXTAUTH_URL=http://localhost:3010 CYPRESS_BASE_URL=http://localhost:3010 start-server-and-test "pnpm --filter @apps/cms exec next dev -p 3010" http://localhost:3010 "env -u ELECTRON_RUN_AS_NODE pnpm exec cypress run --config-file apps/cms/cypress.config.mjs --spec apps/cms/cypress/e2e/cms-a11y-core.cy.ts"
scripts.e2e:cms:shop: TEST_DATA_ROOT=__tests__/data NEXTAUTH_URL=http://localhost:3010 CYPRESS_BASE_URL=http://localhost:3010 start-server-and-test "pnpm --filter @apps/cms exec next dev -p 3010" http://localhost:3010 "env -u ELECTRON_RUN_AS_NODE pnpm exec cypress run --config-file apps/cms/cypress.config.mjs --spec apps/cms/cypress/e2e/cms-a11y-shop.cy.ts"
scripts.e2e:cms:settings: TEST_DATA_ROOT=__tests__/data NEXTAUTH_URL=http://localhost:3010 CYPRESS_BASE_URL=http://localhost:3010 start-server-and-test "pnpm --filter @apps/cms exec next dev -p 3010" http://localhost:3010 "env -u ELECTRON_RUN_AS_NODE pnpm exec cypress run --config-file apps/cms/cypress.config.mjs --spec apps/cms/cypress/e2e/cms-a11y-shop-settings.cy.ts"
scripts.e2e:cms:data: TEST_DATA_ROOT=__tests__/data NEXTAUTH_URL=http://localhost:3010 CYPRESS_BASE_URL=http://localhost:3010 start-server-and-test "pnpm --filter @apps/cms exec next dev -p 3010" http://localhost:3010 "env -u ELECTRON_RUN_AS_NODE pnpm exec cypress run --config-file apps/cms/cypress.config.mjs --spec apps/cms/cypress/e2e/cms-a11y-data.cy.ts"
scripts.e2e:cms:previews: TEST_DATA_ROOT=__tests__/data NEXTAUTH_URL=http://localhost:3010 CYPRESS_BASE_URL=http://localhost:3010 start-server-and-test "pnpm --filter @apps/cms exec next dev -p 3010" http://localhost:3010 "env -u ELECTRON_RUN_AS_NODE pnpm exec cypress run --config-file apps/cms/cypress.config.mjs --spec apps/cms/cypress/e2e/cms-a11y-previews.cy.ts"
scripts.e2e:cms:admin: TEST_DATA_ROOT=__tests__/data NEXTAUTH_URL=http://localhost:3010 CYPRESS_BASE_URL=http://localhost:3010 start-server-and-test "pnpm --filter @apps/cms exec next dev -p 3010" http://localhost:3010 "env -u ELECTRON_RUN_AS_NODE pnpm exec cypress run --config-file apps/cms/cypress.config.mjs --spec apps/cms/cypress/e2e/cms-a11y-admin.cy.ts"
scripts.e2e:cms:dnd: NEXTAUTH_URL=http://localhost:3010 CYPRESS_BASE_URL=http://localhost:3010 sh -c 'ROOT=$(node --import tsx scripts/src/mktemp-data-root.ts) && start-server-and-test "DATA_ROOT=$ROOT/shops pnpm --filter @apps/cms exec next dev -H 127.0.0.1 -p 3010" http://localhost:3010 "TEST_DATA_ROOT=$ROOT/shops pnpm exec cypress run --config-file apps/cms/cypress.config.mjs --spec apps/cms/cypress/e2e/cms-page-builder-dnd.cy.ts,apps/cms/cypress/e2e/cms-page-builder.cy.ts"'
scripts.e2e:cms:functional: NEXTAUTH_URL=http://localhost:3010 CYPRESS_BASE_URL=http://localhost:3010 sh -c 'ROOT=$(node --import tsx scripts/src/mktemp-data-root.ts) && start-server-and-test "DATA_ROOT=$ROOT/shops pnpm --filter @apps/cms exec next dev -H 127.0.0.1 -p 3010" http://localhost:3010 "TEST_DATA_ROOT=$ROOT/shops pnpm exec cypress run --config-file apps/cms/cypress.config.mjs --spec apps/cms/cypress/e2e/cms-*-functional.cy.ts"'
scripts.e2e:shop: TEST_DATA_ROOT=__tests__/data node --import tsx scripts/src/seed-test-data.ts && start-server-and-test "sh -c 'pnpm --filter @apps/cover-me-pretty build && pnpm --filter @apps/cover-me-pretty start'" http://localhost:3004 "CYPRESS_BASE_URL=http://localhost:3004 pnpm exec cypress run --config-file apps/cms/cypress.config.mjs --spec apps/cms/cypress/e2e/shop-*.cy.ts,apps/cms/cypress/e2e/session-expiration.cy.ts"
scripts.test:e2e: pnpm run e2e:dashboard && pnpm run e2e:shop
scripts.test-storybook:all: cross-env WAIT_ON_TIMEOUT=120000 start-server-and-test "pnpm --filter @apps/storybook run dev:ci" http://localhost:6007 "pnpm exec test-storybook --url http://localhost:6007"
scripts.test-storybook:runner: cross-env WAIT_ON_TIMEOUT=120000 start-server-and-test "pnpm run storybook:ci" http://localhost:6007 "pnpm exec test-storybook --config-dir apps/storybook/.storybook-ci --url http://localhost:6007 --includeTags ci --testTimeout 30000 --maxWorkers 2"
scripts.test-storybook:coverage: cross-env WAIT_ON_TIMEOUT=120000 VITE_COVERAGE=true STORYBOOK_COVERAGE=1 start-server-and-test "pnpm run storybook:ci" http://localhost:6007 "pnpm exec test-storybook --config-dir apps/storybook/.storybook-ci --url http://localhost:6007 --includeTags ci --testTimeout 30000 --maxWorkers 2 --coverage"
scripts.storybook:smoke:ci: cross-env WAIT_ON_TIMEOUT=120000 start-server-and-test "pnpm run storybook:ci" http://localhost:6007 "pnpm exec playwright test .storybook/test-runner/__tests__/{smoke-health,tokens,usefsm,ci-stories}.test.ts --reporter=list"
scripts.storybook:smoke: cross-env WAIT_ON_TIMEOUT=120000 start-server-and-test "pnpm run storybook:ci" http://localhost:6007 "pnpm exec playwright test .storybook/test-runner/__tests__/{smoke-health,tokens,usefsm}.test.ts --reporter=list"
scripts.storybook:smoke:ui: cross-env WAIT_ON_TIMEOUT=120000 start-server-and-test "pnpm run storybook:ci" http://localhost:6007 "pnpm exec playwright test apps/storybook/.storybook/test-runner/__tests__/rtl-tokens.test.ts --reporter=list"
scripts.provision-cms: pnpm run create-shop && pnpm run build:tokens
scripts.tailwind:check: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--experimental-vm-modules" pnpm exec jest test/unit/tailwind-build.spec.ts test/unit/postcss-config.spec.ts test/unit/tailwind-postcss.spec.ts
scripts.clean: pnpm -r exec rimraf dist build lib *.tsbuildinfo

simple-git-hooks.pre-commit: pnpm exec cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=6144 pnpm exec lint-staged
